"Xiandy": "Thank you for coming. Allow me to introduce myself again."
"As I said, my name is Xiandy. I am studying various unusual phenomena occurring across Halpha."
"I called you here because I need your help to investigate a currently-ongoing phenomenon."
"Welcome back. I was able to record plenty of battle data."
"Your results may have even attracted the interest of other researchers."
"I think I'd like to use this data to research enemy vulnerabilities, as well as the manufacturing of effective equipment."
"Thank you very much for your help with this."
"You can exchange the points you've been given for rewards. Let me know what you need."
"I would be grateful if you would send me data from your engagements with Season Symbol-marked enemies on a regular basis."
"Thank you for your assistance."
"We are intensely investigating how the enemies have changed this season."
"Any amount of data of you could provide would be most appreciated."
"Thank you very much! This is some valuable data!"
"With this, we're one step closer to unraveling the connection between Gaeira and the enemies."
"So... yes. I was hoping you could get me a little bit more enemy data."
"If you don't mind, your cooperation would be most appreciated."
"Excellent work! This data will be great for my research."
"Alright, this next request also comes from the ARKS combat division..."
"Thank you for your continued assistance."
"Thanks for coming to see me."
"Once again, I'd like to ask if you could investigate something for me..."
